'''''Mallorn'' 53''' is the fifty-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s biannual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in Spring [[2012]]. This was the last issue to be published biannually; the journal returned to its annual format with [[Mallorn 54|''Mallorn'' 54]] coming out a year later in Spring [[2013]].
